lines.text: Maybe... Slick brought it with him, before he started shooting?
Like, maybe the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard</c> wasn't a victim- maybe Slick was using them as a fence, tring to sell a stolen statue.
And then, when the wizard wouldn't pay up, he unloaded!
This is the fourth floor, and there's no elevator. You think Slick carried a life-size statue up that many stairs?
You really should've warned me about the stairs, dog.
You had to climb them to get here.
And stairs aside, there had to be an actual wizard to cast that <c=#0000FF>Living Memory.</c>
